title: Girl Gamers
body: Do all girls get free skins from boys. Most of my friends (girls) tend to get skins from boys because of their beauty and because they are a girl. Do girls purposely flirt boys for skins or are boys trying to get girls attention with skins?

replies.body: I haven't. I tend to let people assume that I'm male when online gaming. It avoids the onslaught of sexual harassment that comes with them finding out. Doesn't happen all the time of course, not everyone is an asshole, just enough to make one wary.
That I can understand. Certain people look at my username and make the assumption that I'm a girl and their reactions to that is something that shouldn't be happening.

> [{quoted}](name=TheZarkness,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0AQ2H1Il,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-07-29T03:32:33.565+0000)
>
> I haven't. I tend to let people assume that I'm male when online gaming. It avoids the onslaught of sexual harassment that comes with them finding out. Doesn't happen all the time of course, not everyone is an asshole, just enough to make one wary.

I feel really bad you have to do that tbh

> [{quoted}](name=TheZarkness,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0AQ2H1Il,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-07-29T03:32:33.565+0000)
>
> I haven't. I tend to let people assume that I'm male when online gaming. It avoids the onslaught of sexual harassment that comes with them finding out. Doesn't happen all the time of course, not everyone is an asshole, just enough to make one wary.

How often are girls actually getting sexually harassed in games when people find out their gender (assuming it's not their fault in pushing it so hard into people's face that got them annoyed in the first place)?

While I might not game as much as the other guy, but from all my experience on WoW, LoL and hell Minecraft, the cases I have seen are about like 5 to 10 in total, and are mostly mild.


EDIT: not to mention, general harassing and sexual harassment are 2 different things.

Like I said doesn't happen all of the time, mostly because not everyone is an asshole. I was just pointing out that no not all girls flirt for skins, some of us are just here to game. 

Also yes I am very aware of the differences between general and sexual harassment.

I can admit to doing this. I have probably only bought about 40% of my skins with my own money. The rest of them have been gifted to me. There are times where I've flirted for them (which sounds whorey af) but there are also times where they've just given them to me for the sake of doing so.

:) want a free skin

2 bad, I don't have any RP, I don't know you either

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0AQ2H1Il,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-27T10:44:13.141+0000)
>
> :) want a free skin
> 
> 2 bad, I don't have any RP, I don't know you either

I only spend $25 on this games, while everyone else spent like $50 on me. I think it's because of my kindness and possibly, because I made some epic plays.

I get free skins from girls.
Is that normal?

Like pax sivir and shit.
I guess being outrageous pays. {{champion:44}} 

Ps. No, I don't send nudes. Ladies, please, I'm married.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0AQ2H1Il,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-08-05T00:57:12.016+0000)

> I guess being outrageous pays. {{champion:44}} 
> 
> Ps. No, I don't send nudes. Ladies, please, I'm married.

I had receive some free skins from girl as well. :D
Your lucky
Or we're just that cool.
lel

Girl- Pro:Gets free skin. Con: nothing
Boy- Pro: Gets satisfaction of giving them a skin/making them happy/getting to play with them/make friends/(sometimes even sexual favors o_o) 
Con: Nothing (unless you think spending 5 dollars is a con.. but then again they still made the choice to do that)

I don't really see the problem. It's basically a win-win if that's what you really want to do.

I gift people  just because I like them and think they're cool, regardless of their gender :)

I gifted this one guys once, so he repaid me, then we did like i think 2 skin / champ gifts each xD
He's an awesome friend xD
I got Zyra and I think a skin for Master Yi, I think i forgot the skin

"I wonder how much free stuff I would get if I could be a girl for a day." 

A friend of mine said this.

Both.
and both sides are what's wrong with gaming.

That's ironic, coming from someone called Jayboy.

I hate to admit that I may gift skins for that reason someday.

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0AQ2H1Il,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-27T11:39:57.816+0000)
>
> That's ironic, coming from someone called Jayboy.
> 
> I hate to admit that I may gift skins for that reason someday.

I am surprise that you didn't call me Gayboy, like most 12 years old. :P

Hey, that's not something you assume, even in LoL. Though I'm probably gonna be a hypocrite after what I say next, so nvm.

Sometimes I meet male players with female usernames but Jayboy just sounds like a name only a young boy would take :/

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0AQ2H1Il,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-07-28T13:47:46.814+0000)

That was my nickname when I was young.I guess my name should be JayMAN :3
Oh wow I misread your post, I thought you said _you_ were also a girl. NVM

Um.... no. That's rather rude actually. Personally, I don't play to flirt with men (1. Because I have a boyfriend 2. Because I have my own money and 3. Because I hate asking anyone for anything). I suppose men are trying to get a girl's attention with skins, but there are some exceptions of women exploiting men.

-Denki

Well look at the positive and negative side to this:

Positive:
* Skin
* Free stuff

Negative:
* Using someone for personal benefit
* Guilt of ^

From a dude's perspective, this is wrong, and I don't think that any girl would try to flirt to a dude to use someone like that.
From a girls perspective, it may be (I'm a dude, so give me some credit to try and decipher this), that they're getting the skins to impress someone that they're a serious gamer? Or maybe to tell they're not noob? Or to even to prove dude's wrong, that not only can we (boys) are the good ones, but they're also a threat in the gaming business.

This is a very educated guess, so have mercy on your replies :P

Thanks for the positive reply :D

I am such a handsome guy, why don't I get skins from the girls? 

Where is equality?
Nope, because they have tits :P

My friends and I mystery gift each other just because we're friends,
not because of anything else because I don't associated myself with people who don't respect me as another fellow player.

some girls say this "Nudes for skins" in their LOL status, and sometimes times they are joking, but sometimes they are not. Make me smile and laugh a little, because it shows that some girls find that skins is more important then the privacy of their body. 
-Jayboy

I gift my little bro skins, he buys me skins sometimes too and I think it's just nice to gift; I think because it's an ice-breaker in some ways and also a way of communicating and it feels good to be nice to people, it often ends up being between boys and girls because we have so many differences that its nice to see what they're into or have some form of relationship with them because there's a lot of ways in which we can't relate so if we can just do things that are nice it makes the world a better place.

As for flirting I really don't think that's related to personal gain in most cases and if it is, what are you really missing as a reward? I mean being nice is a reward in itself for most people and if they love you and leave you, its better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
If your in Australia it's fine because our national anthem states "We are young and free" so as far as I can see(I have 19/20 vision) do what eve you want if you in Aus.

you are*
whatever*
you are*
